title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: September 27, 2023, 02:03:42 PMLast edit: October 12, 2023, 03:01:45 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: This is a group buy for a Balletcrypto REAL series wallet where the packaging is in Ukrainian and being sold by a new reseller in the Ukraine. The package and the enclosed instructions with the wallet are in Ukrainian.They do sell the wallets on their site here: https://lwallet.com.ua/product/ballet-crypto/(FROM THEM) The cost is: 1990.00 UAH (approx. $54 USD)The shipping cost to the US (you have to contact them as the US is not an option when going to the cart) is 1800 UAH (approx. $49 USD)By doing this group buy/bulk order I am able to get them slightly cheaper allowing the cost to be the same as buying a wallet direct from Ballet.PRICE$35 USD PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC and only to this address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es Can also pay via Lightning if your wallet supports LN addresses: moparmining@walletofsatoshi.com if you get a pm to pay any other way - ignore it, it will not be from me.SHIPPING:Shipping can be done directly by me or item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones.If you are in the US and want them shipped direct - add $5 total to your request for shipping/handling. International - will have to do that one a case by case.please put your request as follow:1 - MoparMiningLLC
